title: Amy Gets The Shocker + Bobby Geeks Out Over Yodel Kid Run In + Announces New BobbyCast Series ‘The Trouble Tapes’
itunes:title: Amy Gets The Shocker + Bobby Geeks Out Over Yodel Kid Run In + Announces New BobbyCast Series ‘The Trouble Tapes’
description:
Amy steps up to play Shocker Trivia. Bobby recalls running into the Yodel Kid on his flight and geeking out over it. Also, Bobby announces a new series on the BobbyCast called “The Trouble Tapes” which recaps the many times the show has gotten into hot water. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
